meanings.definition: A taste that lingers after the food or drink has been swallowed.
meanings.sent1: The aftertastes of the spicy curry stayed with me long after dinner.
meanings.sent2: I could still sense the aftertastes of the mint in my mouth.
meanings.sent3: The aftertastes of the sour lemon made me pucker my lips.
meanings.sent4: The aftertastes of success motivated me to keep working hard.
meanings.sent5: The aftertastes of nostalgia flooded my mind as I bit into the homemade cookie.

meanings.definition: A lingering impression or feeling that remains after an experience.
meanings.sent1: The aftertastes of excitement from the roller coaster ride stayed with me all day.
meanings.sent2: The aftertastes of disappointment lingered in the air after the failed presentation.
meanings.sent3: The aftertastes of laughter filled the room long after the joke was told.
meanings.sent4: The aftertastes of love enveloped her heart even in his absence.
meanings.sent5: The aftertastes of fear haunted her dreams, leaving her restless at night.
